entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Inuvik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:42 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -33.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Inuvik Airport 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: -33.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -42
Dewpoint: -37.1°C
Wind: NE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 45 this evening and minus 51 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 36.
